snippet: Scott Boras, considered baseball’s most prominent player agent, strongly suggested the Mets would be better served if the team’s current owners, embroiled in financial difficulties, are replaced.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; prominent sports agent Scott Boras strongly suggests that the New York Mets would be better served under new ownership; other MLB items noted.
lead_paragraph: Scott Boras, considered baseball’s most prominent player agent, strongly suggested the Mets would be better served if the team’s current owners, embroiled in financial difficulties, are replaced.

headline.seo: Agent Scott Boras Says New Owners Would Benefit Mets and Baseball
headline.main: Boras Says Mets Need New Ownership
headline.print_headline: Boras Says Mets Need New Ownership
